name: Asteroids (v0.2.0)
description:
CONTROLS:

UP ARROW - Move forward

LEFT AND RIGHT ARROWS - Rotate your ship

SPACEBAR - Shoot

ASSET CREDIT:

Bullet: https://chrismalnu.files.wordpress.com/2016/02/clash2.png?w=680

Ship (copied from, but recreated as a png by hand): http://media4.giphy.com/media/C4laEXs0lNIcw/giphy.gif

Explosion: http://www.sprites-inc.co.uk/files/X/X4/Misc/GameObjects/Effects/X4Explosion.gif

Music: https://soundcloud.com/andreas-stock-6/ambient-space-music-askprojekt-exoplanets

Explosion sound: http://soundbible.com/1367-Grenade.html

Laser sound: http://soundbible.com/470-Laser-Blaster.html

I am not making any money off of this game, this is simply a project that I wanted to upload for sharing. Every asset not mentioned here is created by me. Made using Unity Personal Edition. Uploaded 10/24/16.

EDIT: There is a bug where the explosion graphic will not vanish and will loop infinitely. This is a known issue, and I am working on how to fix it.
